summary: This module implements file seeking functionality within Sendmail's I/O library, supporting various seek modes (current position, set position, end of file) with timeout capabilities. It includes optimizations for regular files and handles edge cases like buffers, ungetc data, and error conditions.

logs.reason: This is the RCS ID string that identifies the version of the source file, which might appear in version information logs.
logs.resolution: This is informational only and doesn't require resolution.
